department.en: MSc in Hydrologocal and  Oceanic Sciences
department.ch: 水文與海洋科學研究所碩士班

goal.en: “The purpose of present course is to let the students be capable to process lab data in various format using Matlab. We start from the data coding/decoding with netCDF toolbox and data visualization. Then we introduce the theoretical basis of Statistics, Regression analysis, Probability and risk analysis, Fourier analysis, Wavelet transformation and fundamentals of image processing. The in-class practicum is adopted with the aim that students are capable to seek and find solutions to data processing issues independently.“
goal.ch: 協助學生熟悉Matlab，使其可以Matlab作為主要工具進行資料解碼、數據視覺化。進一步逐一介紹地球科學領域資料分析所必須具備的統計學、迴歸分析、機率與風險分析、傅立葉頻譜分析、小波轉換及初步數位影像處理等原理，並以課堂實作方式，透過實際觀測或預測數據之處理，讓學生活用Matlab各項指令與相關工具箱。

content.en:
1. Introduction to Data Analysis and Matlab
2. Visualize typhoon using netCDF and m_map toolboxes.
3. Statistics
4. Regression Analysis
5. Probability and Risk analysis
6. Fourier Spectral Analysis
7. Wavelet Transform
8. Fundamentals of Digital Image Processes
content.ch:
1. 資料分析與Matlab介紹
2. 颱風各項參數視覺化-利用 netCDF 與 m_map工具箱
3. 基礎統計學
4. 線性迴歸分析
5. 機率論與風險分析
6. 傅立葉分析與頻譜分析
7. 小波轉換分析
8. 基礎數位影像處理

textbook.en: Data Analysis Methods in Physical Oceanography 2nd ed. By W.J. Emery and Richard E. Thomson
textbook.ch: Data Analysis Methods in Physical Oceanography 2nd ed. By W.J. Emery and Richard E. Thomson

grading.ch: 上課實作表現(70％)，期末考試(30％)

en.Assessments: Test/Exam ， Practices/Experiments ， Attendance/Performance ， Self Assessment/ Peer Assessment

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 實作/實驗 ， 出席/課堂表現 ， 自我評量/同儕互評
